### January 6 (Thursday)

```{r include=FALSE}
require(knitr)
require(kableExtra)
require(dplyr)
# rmarkdown::render_site()
```

```{r echo=FALSE, include=TRUE}
section_title <- c(
  "Session 1: Welcome Address",
  "Break",
  "Session 2: Causal Inference and Big Data",
  "Break",
  "Section 3",
  "Break",
  "Section 4"
)
  
section_time <- c(
  "9:00–10:30 am",
  "10:30-10:40 am",
  "10:40-12:10 pm",
  "12:10–1:00 pm",
  "1:00–2:30 pm",
  "2:30-2:45 pm",
  "2:45-4:15 pm"
)

section_zoom <- c(
  rep("https://zoom.us/", length(section_time))
)

tibble(
  title = section_title,
  time = section_time,
  zoom = section_zoom
) %>%
  mutate(
    section_header = paste0(
      section_title, " ",
      "(", section_time, ")",
      if_else(section_zoom != "", 
              paste0("  ", "[Zoom](", section_zoom, ")"),
              ""
      )
    )
  ) %>%
  pull(section_header) -> section_header


event_name <- c(

  "Round Table: _Past, Present, and Future of Political Methodology._\n
   **Panelist**: Molly Roberts, Yiqing Xu, Betsy Sinclair",
  "Break",

  "Daniel J. Hopkins, Yphtach Lelkes, Samuel Wolken. _Which News Goes Viral? Measuring Identity Threats and Engagement with News Media Posts on Twitter and Facebook._",
  "Discussant: Xun Pang (Tsinghua University)",
  "Lunch Break", 
  "Ye Wang, Yiqing Xu, Junlong Aaron Zhou. _Regression Discontinuity Designs for High-frequency Time-Series Cross-Sectional Data._",
  "Licheng Liu and Xun Pang. _Causal Inferences with Time-Series Cross-Sectional Data under Spatial Interference and Interdependence: A Model-based Approach._",
  "Discussant: Joon Seok Yang (Sungkyunkwan University)",

  "Han Zhang and Haoran Liang.	_Joint Text-and-Image Clustering for Social Science Research._",
  "Fang-Yi Chiou and Max Goplerud. _Measuring and Theorizing the Legislative Records of Members of the United States Congress, 1873-2010._",

)

events <- if_else(
  paper_link != "",
  paste0(event_name, " ", "([paper](", paper_link, "))"),
  event_name
)

schedule_tab <- tibble(
  Time = c(
    rep(section_header[1], 2), 
    section_header[2], 
    rep(section_header[3], 3), 
    section_header[4],
    rep(section_header[5], 3), 
    section_header[6], 
    rep(section_header[7],3)),
  Time_fill = rep("", length(events)),
  Time_start = c(
    "9:00am-", "9:45am-",
    "", 
    "10:40am-", "11:10am-", "11:40am-",

    "2:45pm-", "3:15pm-", "3:45pm-"
  ),
  Events = events
) 

schedule_tab %>% 
  select(Time_start, Events) %>% 
  kable(col.names = NULL) %>% 
    kable_styling(full_width = TRUE, font_size = 20) %>% 
    column_spec(1, bold = FALSE) %>% 
    column_spec(2, 
                background = c(
                  rep("#95a5a6", 2), 
                  "#BCC5C5", 
                  rep("#3c4c5d", 3),
                  "#BCC5C5",

                  ),

    pack_rows(
      index = table(forcats::fct_inorder(schedule_tab$Time)),
      label_row_css = "border-bottom: 4px solid;",
    )
```
